visual_dna.architecture: A massive marble plaza stretching between the Capitoline and Palatine hills. Weathered pillars line the edges, casting long shadows. Statues of ancestors watch from pedestals.
visual_dna.lighting_default: Harsh Mediterranean sun, deep shadows under colonnades.
visual_dna.atmosphere: Crowds of citizens, merchants shouting, the smell of incense from nearby temples mixed with sweat and dust.

visual_dna.architecture: A rectangular room with high ceilings. Faded frescoes of maritime scenes on the walls. A large wooden table dominates the center, covered in scrolls and wax tablets.
visual_dna.lighting_default: Oil lamps casting long shadows. A single high window admits gray daylight.
visual_dna.atmosphere: Controlled chaosâ€”organized disorder of a working space. Maps pinned to walls. The smell of ink and old papyrus.

visual_dna.architecture: A traditional Roman atrium with impluvium at center. Ancestral masks line the walls. Modest but dignified furnishings showing old money restraint.
visual_dna.lighting_default: Natural light from compluvium, dappled by rain on winter days.
visual_dna.atmosphere: Quiet dignity, the weight of tradition. Servants move silently.

visual_dna.architecture: Vaulted ceilings, steam-filled chambers, marble benches along walls. Echoing acoustics.
visual_dna.lighting_default: Diffused light through high windows, steam softening all edges.
visual_dna.atmosphere: The roar of water, quiet conversations, the smell of oil and sweat.

visual_dna.architecture: Low ceilings, smoke-stained beams, rough wooden tables. A counter with amphorae behind.
visual_dna.atmosphere: Loud voices, dice rattling, the smell of cheap wine and unwashed bodies.

extra_templates.roman_crowd_plebeian: Common Roman citizens in rough-spun tunics, weathered faces, calloused hands.
extra_templates.roman_guard: A soldier in iron-banded leather armor, short sword at hip, helmet under arm.
extra_templates.household_slave: A young person in simple gray tunic, barefoot, eyes downcast.
extra_templates.roman_senator: An older man in a white toga with purple border, dignified bearing, silver hair.
